title: Perma banned ticket
body: I was perma banned on the account (Mynamejeff75) because i was having fun with the other team Even though they were being the same way I was being and think its unfair Sense i was just going with the flow and get reported for it! sure i said somethings, not like i actually meant them

replies.body:
you don't submit tickets here, you submit them to support.

support.riotgames.com

^

of course, you still broke the rules, so they're not going to unban the account.
I don't think we can help you in any way.
RIP account, maybe dont intentionally break the rules after multiple prior warnings, and somehow expect you can bullshit out of it.
Chat logs and don't forget that there are more people than just you and the enemy
